targets.query:
from(bucket: "rpi")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "pmsa003a")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "pm025")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "rpi")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "pmsa003a")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "pm010" or r["_field"] == "pm025" or r["_field"] == "pm100")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "rpi")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "bme680")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "temp")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "rpi")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "temp")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "aht21" or r["_measurement"] == "bme680" or r["_measurement"] == "dht22" or r["_measurement"] == "scd41" or r["_measurement"] == "sht40")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "rpi")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "humi")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "bme680")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")
